title: Challenger Ahri is on Sale?
body: Hi, i was wondering if anyone could explain why even though the official page concerning the Snowstorm Sale removed Challenger Ahri from its list of sales, the skin is on sale today.

replies.body: You can grab more info about the reasoning [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/uQERzEsh-challenger-ahri-storms-back-into-snowdown). ^-^

they probably removed it because she wasnt suppose to come back during Winter Snowdown. That skin theme is for the beginning of the season which usually starts in January, so instead of just making people wait another month for their error, they decided to just have a small sale for her skin since i think its only available for a couple of days!
yup,she is. its maybe a mistake. just buy her until they remove her, I just did.
